sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Domestic Violence Task Force Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Domestic Violence Task Force Act.

sections.heading: Public policy.
sections.text: The purpose of this Act is to establish a consistent, uniform statewide system to protect victims and survivors of domestic violence, while holding offenders accountable.

sections.heading: Task Force; creation. The Domestic Violence Task Force, also known as Colton's Task Force, is created. The Task Force shall:

sections.heading: Repeal. This Act is repealed on September 1, 2027.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on September 1, 2027.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
